text: Anne Cuneo (September 1936 – 11 February 2015) was a French-born Swiss journalist, novelist, theatre and movie director and screenwriter. She was born in Paris. She studied in Lausanne. Her first novel came in 1967 and was called Gravé au diamant. In 1979 she received the lesser prize of the Schweizerische Schillerstiftung and by 1987 she worked for Télévision Suisse Romande. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2015 deaths Category:French journalists Category:French screenwriters Category:French movie directors Category:Swiss screenwriters Category:Swiss movie directors Category:Writers from Paris Category:Swiss theatre directors Category:French theatre directors Category:People from Lausanne
title: Anne Cuneo
